New Records: Quentin Grimes set a career-high 26 points
Key Match Events: Cleveland Cavaliers held a 27-point lead midway through the third quarter
Quentin Grimes scored 17 straight points for Dallas
Miscellaneous Highlights: Quentin Grimes' performance was a result of a trade with the Detroit Pistons for Tim Hardaway Jr. and three second-round picks
Grimes has been a key player for the Mavericks with Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving often absent
